HeroSection.title: Now your ISP has a true ally
HeroSection.description: We offer products that meet the highest quality standards, always providing the best support in purchases and services obtained by our customers.
HeroSection.ftth-description: Distribution of active and passive equipment for FTTH networks.
HeroSection.iptv-description: Equipment and support for IPTV services.

ServicesSection.title: We offer quality services
ServicesSection.description: We have a series of optimal services for the management of FTTH (Fiber To The Home) and IPTV (IP Television) networks.
ServicesSection.card-1-description: We provide software to keep a rigorous and detailed control of our clients' users, with the intention of facilitating their ISP work.
ServicesSection.card-2-description: We design optical terminals and customize interoperable firmware.
ServicesSection.card-3-description: We have an FTTH and GPON Laboratory, where we seek to generate new alternatives for the market in the region that adapt to the changes and demands of customers and users.
ServicesSection.card-4: Our Clients at the Cutting Edge
ServicesSection.card-4-description: Laboratory of active equipment, in the facilities of our suppliers we also develop options that are up to market expectations.
ServicesSection.card-5-description: We direct our efforts with courses at the business and individual level, which allow your attendees to discover the best route to manage their businesses optimizing their resources to the maximum.
ServicesSection.card-6-description: We reach all of Colombia, with the intention of facilitating and improving the service provided to our customers.

ProductsSection.title: Products That Connect
ProductsSection.description: Discover our unparalleled range of telecommunications products, from ONTs and OLTs to state-of-the-art solutions. Connect to the future today.

Footer.newsletter: Be the first to know about our news and promotions.
Footer.terms: By subscribing you agree to us sending you information about our products and services. You can cancel your subscription at any time. For more information see our

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle-2: connecting the world with cutting-edge telecommunications solutions.
About.description: We revolutionize the ISP and Cable Operator landscape worldwide, offering turnkey solutions ranging from lightning-fast broadband to cutting-edge OTT/IPTV and IP Telephony.
About.description-2: Our achievements are built upon strategic alliances that project us as leaders in coverage and growth, poised to venture into the Latin American market with products tailored to every need.

Blog.title: The FST Journal
Blog.subtitle: Updates and News from the Telecommunications Industry
Blog.post-description: The prestigious International Fair of Telecommunications and Convergent Technologies, a leader in Latin America, stands out for its commercial exhibits, trends, and technological advancements.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Do you have any questions? Do not hesitate and get in touch.
Contact.card-description: You can fill out the contact form or get in touchthrough the medium of your preference.
